items.title: The Mother Tree
items.subtitle: 基因樹
items.details: When I was just starting 6th grade I got my first job. Paperboy! Boy, was I excited.
items.body: They are big, bold and beautiful. Billboards have been around for quite a while. In almost all places nowadays you can find billboards of just about every product there is in the market. No matter how you see it, billboard advertising is on the rise.
